means: （使）变红( redden的过去式和过去分词 )
（由于羞愧、愤怒、天气热等）脸变红

sentence.Network_en: Our father's face had reddened with rage and he began to sputter.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的父亲气得涨红了脸，说话开始语无伦次。

sentence.Network_en: His nose had been reddened by unaccustomed exposure to the California sun.
sentence.Network_cn: 经过加州阳光不同寻常的照射，他的鼻子晒红了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: setting sun reddened the whole sky ., 夕阳染红了整个天空.
The child ' s mouth trembled a little , reddened , but did not answer ., 孩子的嘴微微颤抖了一下 , 脸顿时就红了 , 但是他没有说话.
She reddened with shame ., 她羞得满脸通红.
redden 脸红, reddened 变红的, redden 雷登

list.abs: diagnostic diagram 诊断图differential reddening 较差红化diffuse density 漫射密度
Interstellar Reddening(星际红化) Blue light is strongly scattered and absorbed by interstellar clouds. Infrared radiation is hardly absorbed at all.
recycled pulsar 再生脉冲星reddened galaxy 红化星系reddened object 红化天体
reddened galaxy 红化星系reddened object 红化天体reddened quasar 红化类星体

entry.def: If someone reddens or their face reddens, their face turns pink or red, often because they are embarrassed or angry.

example.ex: He was working himself up to a fury, his face reddening...
example.tran: 他勃然大怒，脸涨得通红。

means.word_mean: 1. (especially of the face) reddened or suffused with or as if with blood from emotion or exertion;
2. lighted with red light as if with flames;

auth_sentence.content: Two weeks in the sun had reddened her skin.
auth_sentence.res_content: Two weeks in the sun had reddened her skin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Two weeks in the sun had reddened her skin.

auth_sentence.content: His collar was saturated, his face was reddened.
auth_sentence.res_content: His collar was saturated, his face was reddened.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His collar was saturated, his face was reddened.

auth_sentence.content: She reddened and chortled as he twisted her around and pulled her vast rear side into his crotch area.
auth_sentence.res_content: She reddened and chortled as he twisted her around and pulled her vast rear side into his crotch area.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She reddened and chortled as he twisted her around and pulled her vast rear side into his crotch area.
